message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value the product would bring to me.
I understand your perspective, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This offer reflects the product's true value.
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $10,750? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
